header.description: Utilities related to integrating with Box via Web Services, such as Authenticating, Uploading and Deleting files.

step-type.name: Box Request Authentication
step-type.description: Sends an HTTP call to a URL for Authentication Token

property-ui.description: Developer token generated on your application settings webpage or from SSH. Bypasses all other needed authentication. Must be refreshed every hour.
property-ui.label: Auth Token

property-ui.description: Entity ID - Username. Available on your application settings webpage.
property-ui.label: Entity ID

property-ui.description: Client ID - Your application’s client_id. Available on your application settings webpage.
property-ui.label: Client ID

property-ui.description: Client Secret - Your application’s client_secret. Available on your application settings webpage.
property-ui.label: Client Secret

property-ui.description: Used to generate JWTAssertion for authentication. Must be created on your application settings webpage.
property-ui.label: Public Key ID

property-ui.description: Used to generate JWTAssertion for authentication. Generated locally.
property-ui.label: Private Key

property-ui.description: Optional. Needed if Private Key utilizes password for extra layer of security.
property-ui.label: Private Key Password

property-ui.description: If a file name is provided, the response body will be written to that file. The file name is relative to the working directory.
property-ui.label: Output File
